original_text: John wore clothing made of camel’s hair, with a leather belt around his waist, and he ate locusts and wild honey.
korean_text: 요한은 낙타털 옷을 입고 허리에 가죽 띠를 띠고 메뚜기와 석청을 먹더라

sentences.original_text: John wore clothing made of camel's hair
sentences.korean_translation: 요한은 낙타 털로 만든 옷을 입었고

sentences.original_text: with a leather belt around his waist
